City Module Server Function

Source: R/APP_ice_cream_party.R
cityModuleServer.Rd

Server logic for the city module, handling data retrieval from the OpenWeatherMap API, running simulations, and generating outputs.

Usage

cityModuleServer(id, api_key_reactive)

Arguments

id

A unique identifier matching the module's UI `id`.

api_key_reactive

A reactive expression containing the API key for accessing the OpenWeatherMap API.

Value

Server logic for the city module.

Author

Lodrik Adam

On this page

Developed by Lodrik Adam.
